cs.ualberta.conditionlog.model
Class DatabaseInputAdapter

java.lang.Object
  cs.ualberta.conditionlog.model.DatabaseAdapter
      cs.ualberta.conditionlog.model.DatabaseInputAdapter

public class DatabaseInputAdapter
extends DatabaseAdapter

Contains methods for adding entries to the database. It inherits the open() and close() methods from DatabaseAdapter, which are used in the same way.

Author:
tgriffit

addPhoto

public void addPhoto(java.lang.String photo,
                     java.lang.String cond)
Adds a photo to the photos table and to the conditions table with its associated condition

Parameters:
photo - - a filepath to a .bmp file
cond -

addCondition

public void addCondition(java.lang.String cond)
Adds a new condition to the conditions table with no associated photo. The next photo added to the condition will be added to this line in the table.

Parameters:
cond - - the condition to create

addTag

public void addTag(java.lang.String photo,
                   java.lang.String tag)
Adds a line to the tags table which marks a photo with a certain tag

Parameters:
photo - - a filepath to a .bmp file
tag - - the tag to add

Adds the given password hash to the database

Parameters:
